name: Late for School (Prideful Moth)
description:
You're a school bus driver, but you're late for school ! You must drive and dodge dangerous falling rocks, but don't worry you will find plenty of repairs and boost to help you ! Late for school is an highscore game where you have to survive the longest time possible !

Arrows to move

Boost ---> Speed you up and you cannot be damage by rocks for 6 seconds

Repair ---> Heal you

Here's my submission for the Trijam #85 (Hard and fast)

Fast -> you're driving like a speedy boy, you must keep going so no one misses school !

Hard -> Bigs and solid rocks are falling from the sky, isn't it hard enough ?

I took around 3h30 to make it, i had troubles with the sprites (some are really awful looking), but i tried my best to respect the theme.  It's technically my first ever game. I learnt how to use Construct 2 a week ago, so im not even used to it. Im not really a good graphist, and i won't even try to make any music, it will sound horrifying...
